title: Japan Awaits Two-Year Bond Auction Amid Growing Rate Hike Fears
description: Investors are on tenterhooks ahead of Japan’s two-year government bond auction on Thursday, amid speculation that the Bank of Japan may need to raise interest rates more aggressively to rein in inflation and support the yen.
content: Investors are on tenterhooks ahead of Japan’s two-year government bond auction on Thursday, amid speculation that the Bank of Japan may need to raise interest rates more aggressively to rein in inflation and support the yen.
